precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the desktop area.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'Paste Shortcut', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: The right-click context menu is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Appearance" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open and active.
expected_results: The "Appearance" tab will remain active, and no visual changes will occur.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active, displaying the screen saver settings.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is currently displaying "Windows XP".
action: Click the down arrow of the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of screensaver options will appear.

precondition: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu in the 'Display Properties' window is open.
action: Click the '3D Text' item in the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu should display 'None'.
expected_results: The changes made in the 'Display Properties' window will be applied.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click the 'Power...' button at the bottom of the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open in front of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab active. The "Power Options Properties" window is open and in front of the "Display Properties" window.
action: Click the "Power..." button in the "Display Properties" window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will come to the foreground.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "OK" button is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab selected. The "OK" button at the bottom of the window is highlighted.
